H0.text: Direct observation of the important properties of the Earth system is the scientific procedure that best describes the discovery of tectonic plates and the cause of their movement.

H1.text: Controlled laboratory experimentation on a simulation of geological systems is the scientific procedure that best describes the discovery of tectonic plates and the cause of their movement.

H2.text: Methodical testing of a valid hypothesis statement is the scientific procedure that best describes the discovery of tectonic plates and the cause of their movement.

H3.text: Inquiry into the causes of observed geological phenomena is the scientific procedure that best describes the discovery of tectonic plates and the cause of their movement.
